  • Method Details

    • getAllTags

      @GetMapping public List<Tag> getAllTags(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="1") Integer page, @RequestParam(value="page-size",defaultValue="10") Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return all got tags, by calling a method of service layer
      Parameters:
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of tags got from service layer
      See Also:
      • TagService.getAllTags(Integer, Integer)

    • getTheMostWidelyTagOfUserWithTheHighestTotalOrderCost

      @GetMapping("most-widely-used-tag") public Tag getTheMostWidelyTagOfUserWithTheHighestTotalOrderCost()
      Controller GET method that return the most widely used tag for user that have the highest cost of all orders, by calling a method of service layer
      Returns:
      the most widely used tag for user with the highest cost of all orders
      See Also:
      • TagService.getTheMostWidelyTagOfUserWithTheHighestTotalOrderCost()

    • addNewTag

      @PostMapping public Tag addNewTag(@RequestBody Tag tag)
      Controller POST method that add a new tag, by calling a method of service layer
      Parameters:
      tag - tag that are going to be added in DB
      Returns:
      tag that was added in DB
      See Also:
      • TagService.addNewTag(Tag)

    • deleteTag

      @DeleteMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteTag(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Controller DELETE method that delete tag by id, by calling a method of service layer
      Parameters:
      id - id of tag that are going to be deleted
      See Also:
      • TagService.deleteTag(Long)
